replies.body: Buffing Galio might not be the best option. He can now still build full tank, AND deal relatively large amounts of damage

Actually, the buffs were to the AP ratio and nerfs were to the base damage. This means that it rewards players who build AP with more damage, but will tune down the early game damage and overall damage of tank Galio.
Yeah Wuks it hasn't landed anywhere near that mark LMAO. He literally just destroys people now with 3+ seconds of CC, huge innate tankiness and STUPIDLY high burst that is way too hard to dodge.
A galio was 4/5 yesterday and did 1353 damage to me with a single Q. I had 1700 hp. All he had was a ROA and half a Morello
Can you stop releasing skins for the same champions over and over again, lesser played champions need some love too.
Hi, yeah so there's a bug on Rengar that I should mention which is if you E mid jump you will NOT get a stack of your Passive. It really messes Rengar up as that's your entire kit.
Be sure to drop any bug reports in the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) sub-board to increase the likelihood of the appropriate folks seeing it!
